pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister Mark Rutte from the Netherlands | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Trudeau met today with Mark Rutte, the Prime Minister of the Netherlands.

The two leaders discussed the long standing and deep bilateral relationship between Canada and the Netherlands based on common values and strong people-to-people ties. They also touched on other areas of mutual interest, including the upcoming implementation of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.
